mapper.select: select hcai.appId menuId,hcai.appName menuName,hcai.appName title,hcai.parentAppId parentId, case when haa.ID is null then 'false' else 'true' end as checked FROM hx_cust_app_info hcai LEFT JOIN hx_app_auth haa on haa.appId=hcai.appId and haa.authType = #{authType} and haa.authId = #{authId} where hcai.status=4 ORDER BY hcai.showOrder
